thread.title: Raptors star on Trump's ban: 'I think it's [expletive].'
thread.title_full: Raptors star on Trump's ban: 'I think it's [expletive].'

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Raptors star on Trump's ban: 'I think it's [expletive].'
text:
Raptors star on Trump's ban: 'I think it's [expletive].' "I think it's absolute [expletive]." Post to Facebook Raptors star on Trump's ban: 'I think it's [expletive].' "I think it's absolute [expletive]."  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/kyle-lowry-donald-trump-immigration-muslim-ban-toronto-raptors/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Raptors star on Trump's ban: 'I think it's [expletive].' Chris Korman , USA TODAY Sports 2:56 p.m. ET Jan. 30, 2017 
(Photo: Kevin Sousa-USA TODAY Sports) 
Kyle Lowery has some very clear feelings on President Donald Trump's controversial executive order on immigration . 
This is not safe for work. The not-safe-for-work word is uttered four times. Kyle Lowry's comments on President Trump's #MuslimBan pic.twitter.com/DOIPpOE0AP â€” Mark Sheldon (@markdsheldon) January 30, 2017 
Reporter: Any chance you want to try that again without swearing. 
Lowry, still angry: No. Not at all. Y'all gotta bleep that out. That's how I feel about it. 
Lowry is not alone in the sports world, of course. Warriors coach Steve Kerr had a similar sentiment , as did Pat Tillman's widow . Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/kyle-lowry-donald-trump-immigration-muslim-ban-toronto-raptors/ Most Popular
